question:
Which of the following popularized the Qadiri traditions in Srinagar?
1) Mir NazukÂ 
2) Mir Muhammad Ali
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Srinagar was a prominent Qadiri centre in the 16th century. The sultan of Kashmir became the disciple of Shaikh Ahmad Qadiri. He also enrolled his friend Dawud Khaki in the order. Dawud was succeeded by Mir Nazuk and his grandson, Mir Muhammad Ali, who popularized the Qadiri traditions in Srinagar.
